desc: Calling all LEGO lovers, creative connoisseurs, and building block enthusiasts! Stop searching for the final pieces to your ultimate LEGO brick collection and order yourself a bundle of pure LEGO! Our bundles include LEGO from themes such as Lego Star Wars, Friends, Ninjago, City, Minecraft, To name a few.

layout.text: MIXED BULK LEGO : SOLD BY THE KILOGRAM/POUND.
BASED IN THE UK AND IRELAND
